import React, { useEffect, Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { getSiteImages, getData, metaTags, getServerImage } from "../../helpers/api"; import Services from './home/services'; import FAQ from './home/faq'; import Collapsible from 'react-collapsible'; import Testimonials from "./home/testimonials"; export default function Career(props) { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [state, setState] = useState({ careerPopup: false, publisherPopup: false, contactPopup: false, }); useEffect(() => { getData("career-page").then((data) => { setState({ ...state, content: data.content, metatags: data.metatags, services: data.services, right_faqs: data.right_faqs, left_faqs: data.left_faqs, site_settings: data.site_settings, testimonials: data.testimonials }); setLoading(true); }); }, []); if (loading === false) return
; console.log(state.content); return (
{metaTags(state.metatags)}

{state.content.banner_form_text}

{state.content.section1_heading1}

{state.content.section1_text1}

{state.content.section1_heading2}

{state.content.section1_text2}

{state.content.section1_heading3}

{state.content.section1_text3}

{state.content.section2_title}

{state.content.section2_details}

How it works

At Lumicc, we want to help you get the most out of your passion, so that doing what you love is as fulfilling and rewarding as possible, not draining.

Get in touch

Fill out the contact form on this page, and we'll get back to you within 48 hours to learn more about your services and answer any questions you may have.

we’ll help setup your service listing

One of our team members will help you create your listing, price your services, and help you market and brand your offering, helping you achieve maximum exposure for your service

Get paid

A designated account manager will handle all customer relations on your behalf, and we'll only contact you once an order is placed; so that you can focus on what you do best—thinking creatively and delivering outstanding products and services.

Get started
) }
